data.title: Buffalo Pound Provincial Park
data.text:
Buffalo Pound Provincial Park is pleased to offer a digital map that will help you effectively navigate your way through the park during your visit.

To access the map:

Download the Avenza Maps app on your mobile device or tablet

*must be connected to data or wi-fi

Open the app and create an account

*Allow the app to access your location

Select the Store icon (with the shopping cart)

Search for Buffalo Pound Provincial Park

Select Free, then Download

Map is saved under the My Maps icon

The Avenza App will operate like your GPS using satellite coordinates that will show where you are on the map as you make your way through the park. Find your campsite, the nearest trail head, boat launch and more. View the park as a whole, or zoom in for a closer look at each of the areas.

We recommend downloading the app and the map before your trip to the park to avoid any potential connectivity issues. Once the map is downloaded, you won't need to be connected to the internet to use it!
